summary.para: The OCSP_BASIC_SIGNED_RESPONSE_INFO structure contains a basic online certificate status protocol (OCSP) response with a signature.

remarks.para: In an OCSP responder service, this structure receives an encoded structure as its ToBeSigned member. The signature of the ToBeSigned member is stored in the SignatureInfo member. The encoded OCSP_BASIC_SIGNED_RESPONSE_INFO structure is stored in an structure.

On the receiving end, an OCSP client application must decode the Value member to obtain this structure and subsequently decode the OCSP_BASIC_SIGNED_RESPONSE_INFOToBeSigned member to obtain an structure.
OCSP applications can encode or decode this structure by using X509_ASN_ENCODING or PKCS_7_ASN_ENCODING.

summary.para: A BLOB that has been encoded by using Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) and that contains an encoded structure.
A pointer to signature information for the ToBeSigned data.
